betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Clockwork Heart is the foundation of puppetry, every puppet's crafting procedure must come with a Clockwork Heart, Clockwork Heart requires more troublesome materials, it is recommended to craft it under the premise of having a certain economic foundation. 

Blank Seal is the most basic seal material, used to synthesize all the seals to manipulate the puppet. 

The puppet bell is the "wrench" of puppetry, when you hold it you can see the control marks around you, right-click to configure them, right-click on a control mark to dismantle it when you are sneaking, right-click on a puppet to make it follow you around, and if the puppet has a combat attribute, it can attack hostile creatures around it. \When you have unlocked the "Puppet Logistics" research, using a puppet to make Bell sneak right-click on a square or the air, you can see all the items in the nearby containers labeled with the Seal of Control: Supply, and you can click on them to take them. An idle golem nearby will process your request and take the item to the square you dive-righted - if you dive-righted a container, it will go straight in there, if you dive-righted a regular square, it will be dropped there. Of course if what you dive-righted was air, then the golem will give the item directly inside your backpack, as long as your backpack isn't full, otherwise it will drop the item at your feet.
